name: Me'n'u Restaurant
description: The POS system for Me'n'u Restaurant is a comprehensive, standalone solution designed to streamline and optimize restaurant operations. It offers full CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) functionality across several key management areas, including food management, bill management, user management, and report generation. The food management module allows seamless control over the menu, inventory, and pricing, ensuring that all items are accurately tracked and updated. Bill management simplifies the billing process, enabling efficient handling of orders, payments, and receipts. User management ensures secure and organized control of staff access and roles within the system. Additionally, the report generation feature provides valuable insights into sales, inventory, and overall performance, empowering the restaurant management team to make informed decisions. This robust POS system is tailored specifically for Me'n'u Restaurant, facilitating smooth day-to-day operations and enhancing customer service.
tech: React js, Node js, Express js, sqlite

name: BloomMark
description: We pride ourselves on delivering cutting-edge technology solutions that enhance business operations. Recently, we had the privilege of developing a cloud point of sales (POS) system for Bloommark, a leading clothing shop renowned for its contemporary fashion collections and exceptional customer service. Our objective was to design and implement a robust, user-friendly, and scalable POS system that would streamline Bloommark's sales processes, improve inventory management, and provide real-time data insights, ultimately leading to a superior shopping experience for Bloommark's customers. Key features of our solution include cloud-based architecture for enhanced data accessibility and security, an intuitive user interface to simplify sales processes and reduce transaction times, comprehensive inventory management for real-time tracking and automatic reordering, detailed sales reporting and analytics for valuable insights, seamless integration with existing business systems, and scalability to accommodate Bloommark's growth. By implementing this advanced cloud POS system, Bloommark is well-equipped to enhance operational efficiency, improve customer satisfaction, and drive business growth. We are proud of this successful collaboration and look forward to continuing to support Bloommark in its technological journey.
tech: React js, Node js, Express js, MongoDB
